name: roughjs
description: Create graphics using HTML Canvas or SVG with a hand-drawn, sketchy, appearance.

scripts.build: npm run build-d && npm run build-umd
scripts.build-d: rollup src/index.js --o dist/rough.js --f iife --name "rough" && npm run minify-d
scripts.build-umd: rollup src/index.js --o dist/rough.umd.js --f umd --name "rough" && npm run minify-umd

author: Preet Shihn <preetshihn@gmail.com>
